title: Rides
description: Sign up for one of the scheduled rides with leading riders in the circuit.

title: Conferences
description: Outstanding characters from the world of two wheels meet to explain their exploits.

title: Autographs
description: A napkin, a t-shirt or your arm, any place is good to carry a great signature.

title: Contests
description: Be one of the lucky ones to receive some of the spectacular gifts we have for you.

title: Tech Talk
description: Get opportunities to network with CC affiliates around the world, also after the summit.
